```py
>>> arr = [1, 2, 3, 4, 999]
>>> import scipy.stats
>>> print(f"{scipy.stats.kurtosis(arr[:-1],  bias=False):.6f}")
-1.200000
>>> print(f"{scipy.stats.kurtosis(arr,  bias=False):.6f}")
4.999874
>>> s = pd.Series(arr)
>>> s.expanding(4).kurt()
0         NaN
1         NaN
2         NaN
3   -1.200000
4    4.999874
dtype: float64 
```
